dcterms:description: The Pendulum dataset consists of causal variables with causal graph (pendulum angle → shadow length, shadow position) and (light position → shadow length, shadow position).
dcterms:title: Pendulum

dcterms:creator: Mengyue Yang

dcterms:description: The Flow dataset consists of variables with causal graph (ball size → water height), (hole position → water flow), and (water height → water flow).
dcterms:title: Flow

dcterms:creator: Johann Brehmer
Pim De Haan
Phillip Lippe
Taco Cohen
dcterms:description: The CausalCircuit dataset consists of variables with causal graph (robot arm → blue light intensity, green light intensity, and red light intensity), (blue light intensity → red light intensity), and (green light intensity → red light intensity).
dcterms:title: CausalCircuit
